about.page_description: You're lost on Shy'Comics? You don't know what a Sprite Comic is? Learn everything you need to know!
about.desc_what_is_shycomics: It's a website that displays the majority of French and English Sprite Comics!
about.desc_what_is_spritecomic: A Sprite Comic (or SC for short) is essentially a comic that uses sprites and backgrounds from video games. You can now visit our members galleries to read their Sprite Comics.
about.desc_lets_go: Are you the creative kind? Or do you only want to be a part of our community? Don't be afraid to sign up and share your creations! Sprite Comics are created using various free softwares (Paint, Gimp, …). Tutorials are available to teach you the basics of how to create your own Sprite Comic easily!

index.title: Welcome to Shy'Comics!
index.presentation:
Hello and welcome on Shy'Comics, the reference for Sprites Comics! (Understand by this: a comic made with video game sprites and backgrounds). Don't be afraid to read Sprite Comics or even to create and share your own comics!
And if you need advice or you just want to talk with the other members, you should visit our forum!

Have a nice reading :D
index.desc_lost_2: We invite you to visit the page "About" to learn everything you need to know about Sprite Comics and Shy'Comics. You can also visit our members galleries to read their creations for free!
